entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Liard River

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
